featuresCards.heading: Discover the Features of Events Mate

1.title: Welcome to the wedding
1.subtitle: The Ultimate Wedding App WeddMate
1.text: Available across all Apple platforms, Android, and Web. Experience seamless wedding planning and management like never before.

2.title: Rich Information & Assets
2.subtitle: Everything You Need in One Place
2.text: High-resolution images to capture the essence of your special day. Plus, an FAQ section to address all your queries, and localized descriptions for a personalized touch.

3.title: Interact & Engage
3.subtitle: Connect with Your Audience
3.text: Collect reviews to build trust. Showcase your social media presence with integrated links, and provide direct channels like email and phone for easy communication.

4.title: Customize Your Experience
4.subtitle: Personalized Just for You
4.text: Choose from multiple categories to cater to diverse needs. Whether it's photography, venue, or catering, we have got you covered.

5.title: Exciting Features on the Way
5.subtitle: Stay Tuned for More
5.text: Get ready for a messaging feature to connect with vendors and an availability calendar, synced directly with your personal schedule. Coming soon!
